```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, load packages, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

```


```{r, read in data, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

adult_organisms <- read_csv("mean_density_adult_organisms.csv")

```

```{r, wrangle data}

adult_organisms_tidy <- adult_organisms %>% 
  gather(`2009`,`2018`, key = "year", value = "mean_density_per_100m2")

```

1. Mean Density of Adults
```{r, histogram}

organism_hist <- ggplot(adult_organisms_tidy, aes(x = mean_density_per_100m2)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 6, aes(fill = island)) +
  facet_wrap(~ organism, scale = "free") + # Create a 6 bin histogram, color code it by island, split graphic visualization by island. Give each histogram its own y-axis scale
  theme_classic() +
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0,0)) # Remove space between x-axis and graph 

organism_hist

```
